Context: The George Brown College is located in downtown Toronto, with easy access to top employers for field education and networking opportunities. There are three campuses - Casa Loma, St. James, and Waterfront - which are easily accessible by public transit and surrounded by bike lanes. The student residence, The George, is located near the historic Distillery District and has a streetcar stop outside. The college offers campus tours and information sessions for interested students. Contact details for the college are: 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, ask.george@georgebrown.ca. The information on the website is subject to change without notice. There are different ways to see the campuses and facilities online, and students can sign up for updates about application deadlines, college news, events, tours, etc. The college has a social media hub for visitors.
